summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 5, Pettit's University Addition, being the alley between 11th Avenue Northeast and 12th Avenue Northeast, from East 52nd Street to East 55th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9895 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
